name: Roll of the DVL
description:
the DVL wants to play; of course you will.

goal:
avoid the dots & do not go out of bounds

controls:
move with arrow keys, restart with backspace

highscore (level):
write in the comments what level you got, and i'll rate your game 😈

assets used:

  • bleeding beating heart: https://freesound.org/people/BrainClaim/sounds/267065/ by BrainClaim
  • dice roll: https://freesound.org/people/nettimato/sounds/353975/ by nettimato
  • gritty background music: me, made about a year ago

Made for GMTK GameJam 2022, by Vladimirs Nordholm
